short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically adds '?v3=false' to Power Automate to stop new UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stops the new Power Automate UI from being on. Please note you will not be able to override this so the extension will have to be turned off to show the new UI

****This functionality has been added to Flow Catalogue - https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/power-automate-flow-clipb/ddfobkfenabdkeedpanlmnjjlefgpkba?hl=en-GB ****
